title: When will I get my user confirmation?
text: You will receive an email within 24 hours notifying you that your profile is now active.

title: How can I build my profile?
text: Go to the login portal, select the congress you wish to attend as a speaker, and then complete your profile.

title: How can I download my presentation?
text: In your profile, you can upload your presentation when setting up your profile. Alternatively, you can provide the presentation directly to the technical team by sending it via email or using a flash drive to upload it on-site.

title: My presentation is too big; how can I send it?
text: You can upload the presentation on our website; the maximum size will be [specify max size] per file. You will receive an email when we successfully receive it.

title: I want to download my presentation using your website; in what format should it be downloaded?
text: You can download it in PowerPoint or PDF format, and you can download your video also.

title: I have a video along with my presentation; where should I upload it, and in what format?
text: You can also upload it through our website in the same section where you upload your presentation. Please ensure the file is in MP4 format.

title: How long should my presentation be?
text: According to your time in the scientific program.

title: I made an edit to my presentation and need to send it again; what should I do?
text: You can re-upload your presentation by clicking the update button on your profile, and you will receive a confirmation email or notification accordingly.

title: Can I test my presentation before my lecture time?
text: Sure, you can test it 5 to 10 minutes before your lecture time at the technician's desk.

title: If I participate virtually, when will I receive the Zoom link?
text: You will receive the Zoom link at least 24 hours before the congress date, and a notification will be sent to your profile.

title: I have a special requirement during my lecture, such as needing 2 laptops, a whiteboard, printed documents, etc. What should I do?
text: You must inform us two weeks in advance by sending us an email titled 'Special lecture requirement.' Our email: coordinator@eventscons.com

title: I want to cancel my attendance; what are the procedures?
text: You must inform us one month in advance by using the cancellation button in your profile.

title: If I have a video presentation, do I have to prepare a PowerPoint slideshow? Are there any requirements for the slides?
text: If you need to prepare a PowerPoint slideshow, you will receive an email to inform you of any requirements or templates to be used.

title: I was wondering if I could give my lecture via the internet (e.g., Zoom, Webex, or any other provider you prefer). Is that possible?
text: If a virtual session becomes available, we will email you with the details. You can then update your profile to confirm whether you will attend in person or virtually.

title: Can you please guide me on your website to download my presentation and do the required registration?
text: You can download the guides video [Link containing video].
